data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 238,800 people living in Panevezio, Lithuania. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Panevezio, Lithuania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Panevezio, Lithuania to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 3,380 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Panevezio, Lithuania who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Karaite people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 238,800 people living in Panevezio through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Panevezio that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Panevezio, Lithuania has a population of 238,800.

We estimate Panevezio has 3,380 people who might know Jesus, 198,651 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 36,769 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 70 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 238,800 citizens of the the state of Panevezio.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.
